description:
Mô Tả Công Việc
             

              * Major Responsibilities And Authority:
              
              - Make production planning and follow up the production progress
              
              - Manage production materials so that production can operate smoothly
              
              - Details will be discussed in the interview.

requirement:
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
             

              * Experience Required:
              
              Minimum 1 years of experience in foreign invested manufacturing company.
              
              Fresh candidates can be accepted
              

              * Knowledge’s Skills And Abilities:
              
              - English and Excel level: Intermediate
              
              - Good communication & presentation skills
              

              * Education:
              
              Bachelors degree.
             

              Xem toàn bộ Yêu Cầu Công Việc
